backend/main.mo: Defines actor with user, booking, product, inquiry, and payment types plus maps for storing records and authorization logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with related files, components, test IDs, and confidence evidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend pages, utilities, and components.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthModal.t: Authentication modal supporting Internet Identity login, mock Google login message, and profile setup trigger.
Guard component restricting access to admin-only pages with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for collecting and saving a new user's profile details.
App layout wrapper with header, footer, and main content slot.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing copyright, branding, and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: React navigation header with links, mobile menu, auth modal triggers, and admin dashboard access based on identity and owner auth.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the Internet Identity, refreshing queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and auth client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useOwnerAuth.ts: Checks via actor whether the current caller is an admin and exposes loading and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useOwnerRecords.ts: Fetches all admin-level records like bookings, orders, inquiries, and payments using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides user-facing queries and mutations for profiles, bookings, cab types, products, payments, and related actions via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom CSS variables, dark mode values, and utility classes for overlays and hero backgrounds.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ActingDriverBookingPa: Provides a form to request an acting driver, handles authentication, form submission, and displays confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/CabBookingPage.tsx: Enables users to select cab types, enter trip details, book a cab, and view a confirmation screen.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerCarePage.tsx: Allows users to submit customer care inquiries, view their inquiries, and see a confirmation message.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays a landing page with service categories and navigation links to different booking sections.
frontend/src/pages/HotelBookingPage.tsx: Lets users select room types and dates, calculates pricing, submits hotel bookings, and shows confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/OrderHistoryPage.tsx: Shows a user's sales orders with options to update delivery dates or cancel pending orders.
frontend/src/pages/OwnerDashboardPage.ts: Renders an owner dashboard with stats, tabs, and a unified activity feed using multiple data-fetching hooks.
Provides a form for users to submit payment records and view a confirmation screen after submission.
frontend/src/pages/SalesStorePage.tsx: Implements a simple product store with cart management, checkout flow, and order submission.
frontend/src/state/cart.ts: Defines a Zustand store for cart items with add, remove, update, clear, and total price utilities.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Offers helper functions for formatting dates, datetimes, currency, and converting timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Contains project state metadata, key auth and payment changes, architectural notes, known issues, image edit requirements, and a list of existing features with their versions.
